alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 11:35PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact northwest Saint Lucie, northeast Okeechobee, Indian River and southeast Brevard Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1133 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms, preceded by a gust front located along a line extending from Malabar to Roseland, Vero Lake Estates, to 11 miles southeast of Fort Drum. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Sebastian, Vero Beach, Fellsmere and Indian River Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
